channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.16 (Build 20251226.2)
item.description:
What's New

Add macro edit functionality

  • Add edit button to macro rows with pencil icon
  • Implement EditMacroSheet for editing existing macros
  • Add updateMacro method to MacroManagementViewModel
  • Support editing both macro abbreviation and content
  • Include validation for duplicate macros and minimum length
  • Update version to 1.2.16 (20251226.2)

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
